item.title: Slides
item.description: Userful tools and concepts https://epogrebnyak.github.io/slides/tools/ Command line If on Windows, install WSL. Go through Art of command line. Concepts file system (~) streams and redirection (>, >>, |) args and flags (docopt) Tasks Fluency on the command line is a skill often neglected or considered arcane, but it improves your flexibility and productivity as an engineer in both obvious and subtle ways. More at Art of command line.
